record.title: ORDER FOR MORNING BUSINESS
record.narrative:
ORDER FOR MORNING BUSINESS -- (Senate - July 07, 2008)

[Page: S6347]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if my friend will yield for a unanimous consent request, I now ask unanimous consent that there be a period of 1 hour for morning business--we have a number of Senators who want to come over and talk--with Senators permitted to speak for up to 10 minutes each during that hour's period of time.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
